backend/main.mo: Defines the main booking canister with hotel, room, booking, payment, invite token, and subscription types plus maps and admin authorization helpers.
backend/migration.mo: Contains migration logic converting old actor state to the new schema including added hotel contact and subscription fields.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated source files, components, tests, and confidence levels for tracking changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all key frontend files and their responsibilities across routing, components, and state management.
frontend/index.css: Defines global styles and color variables using Tailwind with light/dark theme support.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script with metadata and favicon.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Markdown checklist outlining critical frontend flows, role logic, and validation steps for regression testing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app with routing, query client, localization, and protected routes for guest, hotel, and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Displays a bookings table for admins with loading states and booking detail dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Provides admin controls for hotel activation and subscription status with status badges and update actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Allows admins to generate and manage hotel invite tokens bound to principals with validation and copy actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access-denied page with role info and optional hotel activation workflow.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Displays an error screen for permission-check failures with retry and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Form UI that validates and consumes an invite token to activate a hotel account, with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Checks if a logged‑in user lacks a profile and, if so, forces completion of a name/email/phone form before allowing access.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that blocks children until Internet Identity authentication is complete, showing a login prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role‑based access guard that checks user role, admin override, and hotel activation status before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Dialog displaying full booking details with formatting and optional copy‑to‑clipboard of the guest principal.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Form for creating a booking by selecting dates and guests, calculating total price, and submitting the booking request.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Badge that maps booking status values to labeled UI variants.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Displays a debug-only authentication panel showing identity, role, admin status, and hotel activation based on loaded query data.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Shows a hotel's bookings with loading, empty, and table states, including booking details and status badges.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Allows hotels to view, add, and remove payment methods with form validation and mutation actions.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Provides a form to update hotel profile details with validation for map links and email.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Lists eligible bookings and lets hotels mark stays as completed using a mutation action.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Manages hotel rooms, allowing creation and editing with image uploads and price/currency settings.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Displays hotel subscription status with badges/messages and shows admin contact instructions when inactive or unpaid.
Wraps the app with navigation, main content area, and a footer.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Renders a language dropdown allowing users to switch the UI locale, currently supporting English only.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with dynamic links based on authentication, roles, and hotel/admin status.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Shows admin contact info and payment methods for hotel activation or subscription issues.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Displays a hotel's payment methods and provides contact buttons when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user roles, profiles, hotels, and invite tokens via the actor API.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Provides a React context for storing and updating the UI locale, persisted to localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles, color variables, themes, and global styling for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Renders the account status UI, allowing users to view roles, validate or consume invite tokens, and refresh account data.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Displays the admin dashboard with panels for invite tokens, hotel visibility, and booking management.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Shows a list of hotels retrieved from the API and links to detailed booking pages.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Displays the guest’s bookings, navigation to browsing hotels, and account status actions.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Provides the hotel management interface with tabs for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, stays, and subscription.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Renders a hotel detail view with room listings, booking handling, and user/profile checks using various queries and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Provides the main entry menu allowing navigation to guest or hotel portals based on authentication and hotel/admin status.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Exposes a helper to detect debug mode based on environment or URL parameters.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Defines currency symbols and utilities for formatting money values and validating supported currencies.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters, including sessionStorage fallback and hash parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, feature requirements, issues, and pending actions related to hotel booking pricing and hotel-specific payment/contact info.
